ygData.subject: Re: First magic weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm at level 17 with duel wield in a good round i do 44 damage (2 scims, double attacka nd kick), on average i do 33. Its all a matter of taste. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm at level 17 with duel wield in a good round i do 44 damage (2 scims,
double attacka nd kick), on average i do 33.

Its all a matter of taste.

----- Original Message -----
From: immortal <immy@...>
To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 5:28 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] First magic weapon


> From: "immortal" <immy@...>
>
> You can buy combine long swords from the gypsies in oasis for 65 plat a
> piece
> same stats as fine steel except magical.
> if i were you i'd get a two hand sword, I'm level 24 troll warrior with
> maxed out 2h slashing and a bone bladed claymore, i slash up to 47 damage.
> One hand also wears out your stamina too fast, just my opinion.
>
> -Iqofone
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jestar@... <jestar@...>
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 4:19 PM
> Subject: [warriors_eq] First magic weapon
>
>
> >From: jestar@...
> >
> >Hello fellow warriors.
> >I have a quick question. I am a lvl 13 warrior,with a mino axe working
out
> of Freeport. I will be getting dual wield at 15 and would like to find a
> magic one-handed slashing weapon as my primary and my mino as my
secondary.
> The problem is i never hear magic weapons being auctioned and the ones the
> trader has in North Ro cave are well over 200 plat. Ant tips or
suggestions
> would be appreciated.
> >
